page.title: 16ANIMALS
page.content: Our area is almost ideal for wild life.Most farmers are interested in{ {conservation}so do not disturb habitat or use sprays more than is necessary.Only one stretch of hedgerow and one patch of scrub have been cleared in recent years.There is one{ {badger}set and badgers are seen in the lanes at night.There are large numbers of{grey squirrels},but no one has reported seeing any reds.Perhaps the planting of conifers will encourage their return.{Rabbits}seem to be recovering,but there are still few {weasels }and{stoats.Foxes}are thriving probably due to the large population of {bank voles.Hedgehogs }are numerous,as are{shrews}and molehills can be seen in many fields.We see{ {lizards,slowworms}and occasionally {adders}and{grass snakes.
